title: Print, "Fuochi d'Artifico (Bozzeto) [Sketch for "Fireworks"] from "Progetti Scenici per 'Sintesi Futuriste'" Portfolio", ca. 1980 reproduction of 1915–1925 original
medium: Color lithograph on heavy white wove paper
markings: Publisher's monogram embossed into lower left corner: FM [Franca Manchini]
signed: Printed in gray on plate:  BALLA/FUTURISTA
description: Colorful, abstract city view with skyscrapers and prism-shaped structure at left and center distance.  Green angular forms, perhaps representing foliage and plants, in lower left corner and center.  Large rounded shapes fill lower right corner.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Fuochi d'Artifico (Bozzeto) [Sketch for "Fireworks"] from "Progetti Scenici per 'Sintesi Futuriste'" Portfolio", ca. 1980 reproduction of 1915–1925 original.
ca. 1980 reproduction of 1915–1925 original. Color lithograph on heavy white wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen. 1999-6-5-6.
